titleStmt.title: A testimony concerning the vvorks of the living God. Shewing how the mysteries of his workings hath worked many wayes in and amongst mankind. Or, The knowledge of God revealed, which shews the way from the bondage of darkness into the liberty of the Sons of God.
titleStmt.author: Crabb, John.

titleStmt.title: A testimony concerning the vvorks of the living God. Shewing how the mysteries of his workings hath worked many wayes in and amongst mankind. Or, The knowledge of God revealed, which shews the way from the bondage of darkness into the liberty of the Sons of God.
titleStmt.author: Crabb, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the author, and are to be sold by John Gain, at his house in Upper Moor-Fields, next door to the Flying-Horse,

notesStmt.note: "In London written and printed, the 1st. month, 1682. John Crabb"--P. 20.
Imperfect: cropped with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Friends' Library, London.
